'''Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep''' is a quest item obtained during the [["Heart of Watatsumi"]] [[World Quest]]. It is used in [[The Still Water's Flow]] and [[The Entrance to Tokoyo]] to unlock [[Enkanomiya]].
